scripts.start: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.start:prod: export NODE_ENV=production; cd server && npm start
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../client && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
